sect2.title: Images
sect2.para: The Images plugin generates MapServer images. [...]

para.programlisting: <complexType name="Image"> <all> <element name="isDrawn" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element name="path" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="width" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="height" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="format" type="xsd:string"/> </all> </complexType>

<complexType name="ImagesRequest"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="mainmap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="keymap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="scalebar" type="types:Image"/> </all> </complexType>

<complexType name="ImagesResult"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="mainmap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="keymap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="scalebar" type="types:Image"/> </all> </complexType>
